markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 9"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Echoes in Stone](/Feats.aspx?ID=4397) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=32" />
<trait label="Dwarf" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=54" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 45 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Requirements**
You are standing on a stone or earthen surface

</column>

---

You pause a moment to attune your senses to the stone around you. Until the start of your next turn, you gain imprecise tremorsense with a range of 20 feet.
name: Echoes in Stone
requirement: You are standing on a stone or earthen surface
requirement_markdown: You are standing on a stone or earthen surface
